results.title: Plant-Derived Oleanolic Acid (OA) Ameliorates Risk Factors of Cardiovascular Diseases in a Diet-Induced Pre-Diabetic Rat Model: Effects on Selected Cardiovascular Risk Factors
results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_Prehypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058246 @@@Pre@@@-@DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ animals were grouped into five groups namely @DISEASE_Prediabetic_State @DISEASE_MESH:D011236 @@@prediabetes@@@ control (@DISEASE_Prediabetic_State @DISEASE_MESH:D011236 @@@PC@@@), @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treated (@GENE_MET @GENE_24553 @@@Met@@@), @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ with diet intervention (@GENE_MET @GENE_24553 @@@Met@@@ + DI), @CHEMICAL_Oleanolic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009828 @@@oleanolic acid@@@ treated (@CHEMICAL_Oleanolic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009828 @@@OA@@@), and @CHEMICAL_Oleanolic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009828 @@@oleanolic acid@@@ with diet intervention (@CHEMICAL_Oleanolic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009828 @@@OA@@@ + DI) then treated for 12 weeks.

citations.NLM: Gamede M, Mabuza L, Ngubane P, Khathi A. Plant-Derived Oleanolic Acid (OA) Ameliorates Risk Factors of Cardiovascular Diseases in a Diet-Induced Pre-Diabetic Rat Model: Effects on Selected Cardiovascular Risk Factors Molecules. 2019 Jan 18;24(2):. PMID: 30669379
